The thing is people still buy it either for bragging or because they eat up the small innovations if any. author: @jamescentersmith9323
comment: I'm honestly not really sure why Samsung keeps coming out with newer models every 8 months or so. I got the S24 when it first came out and a tiny bit under a year or less than a year they come out with a brand new model and it's like really you can't just wait five years for the next model. It doesn't even have to be that long. It could be a year and a half until the next model comes out or two years. But, you know, no more than two years. I mean, you still want to, you know, with new technology. It seems like they are going to at some point run out of ideas before they are basically just doing slightly new designs and nothing actual new on the inside. It's all going to be outside appearances that's going to be new at some point because they're going to run out of ideas for what works on the inside, and how it performs. The normal base models all seem to be the same lately. The next Samsung I get is probably going to be an ultra instead of a normal base model. That way I'm at least getting some kind of upgrade. And by the time I need an upgrade, it's probably going to be when the S26 or S27 Ultra comes out. Or maybe when the S30 Ultra comes out, who knows? üòÇ
